cleaned_text: With much of our daily lives affected by COVID-19 and the rapid, sometimes confusing coverage of the vaccine creation process, many people have been asking a question that often accompanies new med You are here Specialties World Class Expertise for Adults and Kids Welcome to Allergy & Immunology at Crystal Run. If you're suffering from asthma or allergy symptoms, you need the world-class expertise of our Allergy & Immunology specialists. Serving the areas of [Middletown, NY](http://www.crystalrunhealthcare.com/locations/middletown-95-crystal-run-rd), [Rock Hill, NY](http://www.crystalrunhealthcare.com/locations/rock-hill), [West Nyack, NY](https://www.crystalrunhealthcare.com/locations/west-nyack) and beyond, they work to diagnose, treat, and manage allergies, asthma, and immunologic disorders, including primary immunodeficiency disorders in both adults and children. At Crystal Run, we work with you to create an allergy management plan designed for your specific condition — a plan that will not just treat your symptoms, but help stop them from happening in the first place. Some common conditions treated by an allergist include: - Allergic disorders including but not limited to: - Indoor and outdoor allergies including pollen, pet, mold and dust mite allergies - Food allergies - Drug allergies - Contact allergies including plant, metal, latex, etc. - Insect allergies - Eye allergies - Allergic reactions - Anaphylaxis - Asthma and asthma-mimicking conditions: - Childhood and adulthood asthma - Exercise-induced asthma - Cough variant asthma - Chronic cough - COPD - Allergy related conditions: - Rhinitis - Sinusitis - Headaches - Eosinophilic esophagitis Gastroesophageal reflux (GERD) - Laryngopharyngeal reflux (LPR) - Mastocytosis - Flushing syndrome - Vocal cord dysfunction - Allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis (ABPA) - Allergic skin disorders: - - Contact Primary immunodeficiencies - Acquired immunodeficiencies - Immunological related disorders Allergy and Immunology Services Offered by Crystal Run Healthcare Whether you suffer from asthma, a skin allergy, or a food allergy, the specialists at Crystal Run Healthcare can help you manage your condition through comprehensive asthma treatment and allergy treatment. After performing diagnostic tests such as a food intolerance test, food allergy testing, or asthma testing, we'll work with you to develop a treatment plan that meets your needs. Looking for "an allergist near me"? Contact us to schedule an appointment with an allergist.
